item.title: Dynamic Ingest API
item.description: Video Cloud: Brightcove's Dynamic Ingest (DI) API is based on functionality where video source files are downloaded from the customer's storage location and specified renditions of the source files are created. The platform is cloud-centric, globally-distributed and based on modern practices to deliver best in class consistency and speed.
item.author: rcrooks@brightcove.com ( Robert Crooks)

item.title: CMS API (beta)
item.description: Video Cloud: Brightcove's CMS API provides a programmatic way to create, update and access data for your Video Cloud videos. The CMS API is currently in beta and is not supported by Brightcove Support. If you would like access to the beta, please contact your Brightcove Account Manager.
item.author: rcrooks@brightcove.com ( Robert Crooks)

item.title: Brightcove Player Updates
item.author: rcrooks@brightcove.com ( Robert Crooks)
item.description:
Video Cloud and Perform 1. Player - Greatly enhanced support for WebVTT-based captions and subtitles, including embedded styling options
- Captions now display on iOS full-screen player
- End-user caption customization options and settings persistence.
All Brightcove Players now meet the FCC guidelines for captioning of full-length video programming when viewed on actively supported browsers.
- Enhanced support for HTML5 text tracks: http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/track/basics/
- Improved starting point behavior for fullscreen emulation in IE8-9
- Updated video.js to 4.11.3 + captions. Changelog: https://github.com/videojs/video.js/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#4113-2014-12-19
2. Catalog
- Load Video Cloud cue points as a metadata track automatically
- Load Video Cloud captions as caption text tracks automatically
- Fix for in-page embeds operating in pages that have overridden XMLHttpRequest ready state constants
3. HLS
- Adjust initial rendition selection to favor higher-quality variants
- Start live streams much closer to the live point - Fix issue that stalled playback if an encoder failed to deliver new segments quickly enough
- Fix memory leak in Chrome when playing HLS in a window that is not visible
